resources.string:
- Test
These actions will be executed immediately, for checking whether it has been set correctly, or maybe you just want to manually run this workflow.

- New
Create a new action, multiple actions can be chained together to complete a complex task.
Those green or red dots between items indicate whether they are chainable or not.
Download spam phone numbers from FTC - Do Not Call every workday, and import them to the spam database.
Delete expired records from the spam database.

The backup file format is a gzip compressed json, you can open and edit it with any archivers.

- Include Spam Database
Long press the button to also export/import the spam database.

Note:
  Including the spam database in the backup file will significantly increase its size, since the database will be updated regularly, this is usually unnecessary, unless you want to clone it to another phone.

-Create
  Always create a new regex rule.

- Replace
  It will try to find an existing rule that has the same description.
   - If found, it will be overridden.
   - If not found, a new rule will be created, same as the Create.

- Merge
 - If a rule with the same description exists, the new numbers will be merged into it,
duplicated numbers will be removed automatically.
 - If not exists, a new rule will be created, same as the Create.
Enable or disable this workflow. A use case would be to make a periodic workflow become one-off.
Enable or disable the app. A use case would be to temporarily disable it and auto re-enable it after a couple of hours.
